body_html: @carpodaster there's one more thing :) - while finding all occurrences of Github_handle fields, I also found them in /teams/:id/edit, and also editable - you can change team members through changing the g_h field - would you like those fields to be disabled, too?
body_text: @carpodaster there's one more thing :) - while finding all occurrences of Github_handle fields, I also found them in /teams/:id/edit, and also editable - you can change team members through changing the g_h field - would you like those fields to be disabled, too?
body:
@carpodaster there's one more thing :) - while finding all occurrences of Github_handle fields, I also found them in /teams/:id/edit, and also editable - you can change team members through changing the g_h field - would you like those fields to be disabled, too?
![teams](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/14924179/16794862/8a2afd88-48da-11e6-88be-5453928e7111.jpg)
